SmallBusiness.title: You're Building the Basics
SmallBusiness.description: You're just getting started with systems and processes. Now's the time to lay a strong foundation.
what_we_found: You may not have a reliable system for managing clients.
Manual work is limiting your time.
You don't yet have consistent marketing processes.
recommended_next_steps: Custom Starter CRM (basic contact tracking, reporting)
Marketing Basics (social media setup, lead capture)

SmallBusiness.title: You're on the Growth Track!
SmallBusiness.description: Your business has a solid foundation, but you need better systems and marketing to grow with confidence.
what_we_found: Manual tasks are slowing you down.
Limited forecasting/reporting makes planning harder.
Marketing efforts may not be generating consistent leads.
recommended_next_steps: Standard CRM + Automations - streamline invoicing, scheduling, and reminders.
Marketing Funnels + Campaigns - attract leads and nurture them automatically.
Quarterly SWOT & Strategy Coaching - align your growth plans with clear actions.

SmallBusiness.title: You're Ready to Scale
SmallBusiness.description: Your systems are working, but now it's time to expand, optimize, and prepare for investors or funding.
what_we_found: You have tools in place, but advanced integrations could save more time.
Reporting may not yet be compliance-ready for funders or boards.
Growth is possible with more automation and AI.

AspiringEntrepreneur.title: Time to Shape Your Idea
AspiringEntrepreneur.description: You've got a dream — now let's turn it into a real business plan.
what_we_found: You may not have a business plan written.
Unsure about systems and tools needed.
Documentation for investors not yet started.

AspiringEntrepreneur.title: You're Ready to Launch!
AspiringEntrepreneur.description: You've got a strong idea, but you need structure and the right tools to move from planning to execution.
what_we_found: You have a business concept but not a full plan.
You may not know what systems you'll need to start smoothly.
Funding and investor documentation might be missing.
recommended_next_steps: Launch with a plan to attract first customers with Go-to-Market Strategy & Funnel Setup.
MVP System Setup - build your starter CRM/website/forms to manage operations.
Investor/Funding Docs Prep - make sure you have what's needed to secure support.

AspiringEntrepreneur.title: Ready to Launch Big
AspiringEntrepreneur.description: You're ready to not just start, but scale right away.
what_we_found: You've got a plan and understand tech needs.
You're thinking about investors and growth from the start.

LookingToGetIntoTech.title: Start Your Tech Journey
LookingToGetIntoTech.description: You're exploring tech but need clarity, confidence, and a roadmap.
what_we_found: Not sure what role fits your skills.
No résumé tailored for tech yet.
Missing certifications or practice.
recommended_next_steps: Career Fit Assessment - can this go out to a Career Fit assessment page???
Intro Classes for your chosen role

LookingToGetIntoTech.title: You're Almost Tech-Ready!
LookingToGetIntoTech.description: You've started your journey, but now you need tools, practice, and guidance to land the role you want.
what_we_found: Your résumé and experience may not yet align with tech roles.
You may not feel fully confident in interviews.
You may be missing certifications or a clear roadmap.
recommended_next_steps: 1:1 Coaching + Mock Interviews - practice real-world interview questions and get feedback
Portfolio/Project Guidance - build artifacts to showcase your skills
Targeted Certifications - identify and pursue the credentials that get noticed

LookingToGetIntoTech.title: You're Job-Ready!
LookingToGetIntoTech.description: You've got the basics down — now it's about excelling, networking, and landing opportunities.
what_we_found: You may already have projects or a portfolio.
You're ready for advanced interview coaching.
You're prepared to grow in your career path.
